content.query:
CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE KiabiPOC WITH (
    LOCATION = 'https://myec44datalake.dfs.core.windows.net',
);


CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [Parquet] WITH (FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET)
GO


CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE smack
(
	customer_rowid varchar(4000),
	 customer_create_date varchar(4000),
	 gender varchar(4000),
	 loyalty_card BIGINT,
	 loyalty_card_status varchar(4000),
	 personnel_kiabi varchar(4000),
	 flag_shared_loyalty_card varchar(4000),
	 customer_country varchar(4000),
	 customer_country_label varchar(4000),
	 birthdate varchar(4000),
	 slice_age varchar(4000),
	 address_quality_score bigint,
	 top_has_address varchar(4000),
	 top_has_telfixe varchar(4000),
	 top_has_gsm varchar(4000),
	 top_has_optinsms varchar(4000),
	 optin_email_kiabi varchar(4000),
	 optin_email_part varchar(4000),
	 nb_child bigint,
	 nb_child_boy bigint,
	 nb_child_girl bigint,
	 nb_child_unknown bigint,
	 first_purchase_date varchar(4000),
	 first_ticket_date varchar(4000),
	 first_order_date varchar(4000),
	 most_used_tckt_pay varchar(4000),
	 most_used_tckt_pay_12rm varchar(4000),
	 code_store_lastpurchase varchar(4000),
	 lati_store_lastpurchase varchar(4000),
	 long_store_lastpurchase varchar(4000),
	 tckt_last_purchase_date varchar(4000),
	 order_last_purchase_date varchar(4000),
	 last_purchase_date varchar(4000),
	 code_store_attac varchar(4000),
	 lati_store_attac varchar(4000),
	 long_store_attac varchar(4000),
	 code_store_open varchar(4000),
	 lati_store_open varchar(4000),
	 long_store_open varchar(4000),
	 nb_product_tckt_maternity_12rm bigint,
	 nb_tckt_return_1rm bigint,
	 nb_tckt_return_6rm bigint,
	 nb_tckt_return_12rm bigint,
	 nb_tckt_return_18rm bigint,
	 nb_tckt_return_24rm bigint,
	 nb_tckt_return_36rm bigint,
	 nb_tckt_return_48rm bigint,
	 nb_tckt_return_all bigint,
	 nb_tckt_1rm bigint,
	 nb_tckt_6rm bigint,
	 nb_tckt_12rm bigint,
	 nb_tckt_18rm bigint,
	 nb_tckt_24rm bigint,
	 nb_tckt_36rm bigint,
	 nb_tckt_48rm bigint,
	 nb_tckt_all bigint,
	 nb_product_order_maternity_12rm bigint,
	 nb_order_1rm BIGINT,
	 nb_order_6rm bigint,
	 nb_order_12rm bigint,
	 nb_order_18rm bigint,
	 nb_order_24rm bigint,
	 nb_order_36rm bigint,
	 nb_order_48rm bigint,
	 nb_order_all bigint,
	 most_used_order_delivery varchar(4000),
	 nb_order_desk_12rm bigint,
	 nb_order_mobile_12rm bigint,
	 nb_order_other_12rm bigint,
	 most_used_order_pay varchar(4000),
	 most_used_order_pay_12rm varchar(4000),
	 nb_tckt_articles_1rm bigint,
	 nb_tckt_articles_12rm bigint,
	 nb_tckt_articles_all bigint,
	 nb_tckt_return_articles_1rm bigint,
	 nb_tckt_return_articles_12rm bigint,
	 nb_tckt_return_articles_all bigint,
	 nb_order_articles_1rm bigint,
	 nb_order_articles_12rm bigint,
	 net_sales_tckt_1rm float,
	 net_sales_tckt_12rm float,
	 net_sales_tckt_all float,
	 net_sales_tckt_return_1rm float,
	 net_sales_tckt_return_12rm float,
	 net_sales_tckt_return_all float,
	 net_sales_order_1rm float,
	 net_sales_order_12rm float,
	 nb_order_eresa_1rm bigint,
	 nb_order_eresa_12rm bigint,
	 nb_order_eresa_all bigint,
	 potentiel_net_sales_eresa_1rm float,
	 potentiel_net_sales_eresa_12rm float,
	 potentiel_net_sales_eresa_all float,
	 customer_activity_kind_1rm varchar(4000),
	 customer_activity_kind_12rm varchar(4000),
	 customer_activity_xcanal_1rm varchar(4000),
	 customer_activity_xcanal_12rm varchar(4000),
	 customer_activity_xcanal_all varchar(4000),
	 product_groups_12rm varchar(4000),
	 product_groups_1rm varchar(4000),
	 product_groups_all varchar(4000),
	 rfm_date_observation varchar(4000),
	 rfm_min_date varchar(4000),
	 rfm_t1 BIGINT,
	 rfm_t2 BIGINT,
	 rfm_t3 BIGINT,
	 rfm_t4 BIGINT,
	 rfm_frequence BIGINT,
	 rfm_sum_ca_ttc float,
	 rfm_scorerfm float,
	 rfm_classerfm varchar(4000),
	 rfm_cluster varchar(4000),
	 cluster_style varchar(4000),
	 net_sales_grbaby_fashion_12rm float,
	 net_sales_grbaby_basic_12rm float,
	 net_sales_grbaby_12rm float,
	 net_sales_grkids_fashion_12rm float,
	 net_sales_grkids_basic_12rm float,
	 net_sales_grkids_12rm float,
	 net_sales_grwomen_fashion_12rm float,
	 net_sales_grwomen_basic_12rm float,
	 net_sales_grwomen_12rm float,
	 net_sales_grmen_fashion_12rm float,
	 net_sales_grmen_basic_12rm float,
	 net_sales_grmen_12rm float,
	 net_sales_grunderwear_fashion_12rm float,
	 net_sales_grunderwear_basic_12rm float,
	 net_sales_grunderwear_12rm float,
	 net_sales_grshoes_fashion_12rm float,
	 net_sales_grshoes_basic_12rm float,
	 net_sales_grshoes_12rm float,
	 net_sales_graccess_fashion_12rm float,
	 net_sales_graccess_basic_12rm float,
	 net_sales_graccess_12rm float,
	 net_sales_grexcluweb_fashion_12rm float,
	 net_sales_grexcluweb_basic_12rm float,
	 net_sales_grexcluweb_12rm float,
	 xcanal_cluster_12rm varchar(4000),
	 attac_store_dist float,
	 nearest_store varchar(4000),
	 nearest_store_dist float,
	 net_sales_tckt_pvi_1rm float,
	 net_sales_tckt_pvi_12rm float,
	 net_sales_order_pvi_1rm float,
	 net_sales_order_pvi_12rm float,
	 class_grwomen varchar(4000),
	 class_grmen varchar(4000),
	 class_grshoes varchar(4000),
	 class_grbaby varchar(4000),
	 class_grexcluweb varchar(4000),
	 class_graccess varchar(4000),
	 class_grconsign varchar(4000),
	 class_grhome varchar(4000),
	 class_grkids varchar(4000),
	 class_grunderwear varchar(4000),
	 first_purchase_canal varchar(4000),
	 slice_first_purchase_date varchar(4000),
	 score_mixite float,
	 main_appetence varchar(4000),
	 secondary_appetence varchar(4000),
	 marketappetence varchar(4000),
	 departmentappetence varchar(4000),
	 net_sales_tckt_6rm float,
	 net_sales_tckt_18rm float,
	 net_sales_tckt_24rm float,
	 net_sales_tckt_36rm float,
	 net_sales_order_6rm float,
	 net_sales_order_18rm float,
	 net_sales_order_24rm float,
	 net_sales_order_36rm float,
	 net_sales_order_all float,
	 nb_etckt_1rm BIGINT,
	 nb_etckt_6rm BIGINT,
	 nb_etckt_12rm BIGINT,
	 nb_etckt_all BIGINT,
	 net_sales_etckt_1rm float,
	 net_sales_etckt_6rm float,
	 net_sales_etckt_12rm float,
	 net_sales_etckt_all float,
	 cluster_evol_nb_24_12rm varchar(4000),
	 cluster_evol_nb_12rm varchar(4000),
	 cluster_evol_net_sales_24_12rm varchar(4000),
	 cluster_evol_net_sales_12rm varchar(4000),
	 percent_evol_net_sales_12rm float,
	 slice_evol_net_sales_12rm varchar(4000),
	 customer_activity_xcanal_12rm_lastyear varchar(4000),
	 rfm_cluster_lastyear varchar(4000),
	 cluster_style_lastyear varchar(4000),
	 flag_anonymous varchar(4000),
	 dt_observation varchar(4000),
	 tec_dt_insert varchar(4000),
	 period varchar(4000)
)
WITH (
DATA_SOURCE = 'KiabiPOC',
LOCATION = N'smack/smack',
FILE_FORMAT = 'PARQUET',
REJECT_TYPE = VALUE,
REJECT_VALUE = 0)
GO
